verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lost for words with all to say, newline Lord You take my breath away, newline Still my soul, my soul cries out, newline You are Holy.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And as I look upon Your name, newline Circumstances fade away newline And now Your glory steals my heart, newline You are Holy newline You are Holy newline You are Holy Lord.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Evermore my heart, my heart, will say newline Above all newline I live for Your glory newline Even if my world falls I will say newline Above all newline I live for Your Glory
